select_a_key_from_the_left_panel_to_view: Select a key from the left panel to view and edit its command chain.
select_a_key_to_see_the_generated_comman: Select a key to see the generated command
select_an_alias_to_see_the_generated_com: Select an alias to see the generated command
clear_destination_chain_prior_to_import: Clear destination chain prior to import
source_has_no_commands: Source has no commands to import
cross_environment_import_warning: Warning: {{dropped}} {{sourceEnv}}-specific commands were dropped when importing to {{targetEnv}}
no_compatible_commands_to_import: No compatible commands to import after filtering
use_standard_key_names_like_f1_ctrl_a_sh: Use standard key names like F1, Ctrl+A, Shift+Space, etc.
click_here_then_press_keys: Click here, then press the key combination
supports_single_modifier_plus_key_combin: Supports single modifier + key combinations (e.g., Ctrl+A, Alt+1, Shift+Space)
select_a_command_type_to_see_preview: Select a command type to see preview
use_alphanumeric_characters_only_no_spac: Use alphanumeric characters only, no spaces
use_in_communication_commands_to_include: - Use in communication commands to include target name
select_key_dialog_description: Choose from the available keys below:
select_visual_effects_to_disable_using_d: Select visual effects to disable using dynFxSetFXExlusionList aliases. Effects are organized by environment.
a_comprehensive_web_based_tool_for_creat: A comprehensive web-based tool for creating, editing, and managing Star Trek Online keybind configurations with visual editing and advanced features.
sto_command_library_with_search_and_cate: STO command library with search and categorization
multiple_profile_management_create_clone: Multiple profile management (create, clone, rename, delete)
custom_alias_system_for_complex_command_: Custom alias system for complex command sequences
vertigo_inspired_vfx_manager_for_visual_: VERTIGO-inspired VFX Manager for visual effects control
import_export_keybind_and_alias_files_an: Import/export keybind and alias files, and project backups
create_a_new_profile_or_use_the_default_: Create a new profile or use the default profile
select_keys_from_the_grid_and_add_comman: Select keys from the grid and add commands from the library
use_the_command_chain_editor_to_build_co: Use the command chain editor to build complex sequences
export_your_keybinds_as_txt_files_for_us: Export your keybinds as .txt files for use in STO
copyright: Â© 2025 STO Tools. All rights reserved.
select_an_item_on_the_left_to_preview_ex: Select an item on the left to preview export
brief_description_of_what_this_alias_doe: Brief description of what this alias does
enter_command_sequence_use_to_separate_c: Enter command sequence (use $$ to separate commands)
toggle_between_grid_and_categorized_view: Toggle between grid and categorized view
ensures_consistent_execution_order_by_mi: Ensures consistent execution order by mirroring commands (Phase 1: left-to-right, Phase 2: right-to-left)
report_footer: This report was generated by STO Tools Keybind Manager. For more information about Star Trek Online keybinds, visit the STO Wiki.

target_enemy_near.name: Target Nearest Enemy
target_enemy_near.description: Target the nearest enemy in view

setactivecostume.name: Set Active Costume
setactivecostume.description: Sets current active costume. Requires two modifiers.

tray_with_backup.name: Tray Execution with Backup
tray_with_backup.description: Execute specific tray slot with backup ability

tray_range.name: Tray Range Execution
tray_range.description: Execute a range of tray slots

tray_range_with_backup.name: Tray Range with Backup
tray_range_with_backup.description: Execute a range of tray slots with backup abilities

whole_tray.name: Whole Tray Execution
whole_tray.description: Execute all slots in a tray

whole_tray_with_backup.name: Whole Tray with Backup
whole_tray_with_backup.description: Execute all slots in a tray with backup tray

distribute_shields.name: Distribute Shields
distribute_shields.description: Evenly distributes shields as if clicking in the middle of the ship and shields icon

reroute_shields_rear.name: Reroute Shields Rear
reroute_shields_rear.description: Route shield power to rear facing

reroute_shields_left.name: Reroute Shields Left
reroute_shields_left.description: Route shield power to left side

reroute_shields_right.name: Reroute Shields Right
reroute_shields_right.description: Route shield power to right side

reroute_shields_forward.name: Reroute Shields Forward
reroute_shields_forward.description: Route shield power to forward facing

throttle_adjust.name: Throttle Adjust
throttle_adjust.description: Increase or decrease the throttle by amount

throttle_set.name: Throttle Set
throttle_set.description: Set the throttle to a specific position (negative = reverse, 0 = stop)

throttle_toggle.name: Throttle Toggle
throttle_toggle.description: Alternates between full throttle and full stop

pitch_up.name: Pitch Up
pitch_up.description: Pitch ship nose up (space altitude change)

pitch_down.name: Pitch Down
pitch_down.description: Pitch ship nose down (space altitude change)

auto_forward.name: Auto Forward
auto_forward.description: Character moves forward until given new movement commands

follow_cancel.name: Cancel Follow
follow_cancel.description: Stop following and forget about the target

cam_distance.name: Set Camera Distance
cam_distance.description: Sets the camera distance from the player

cam_reset.name: Reset Camera
cam_reset.description: Reset the camera position to default

cam_target_lock.name: Lock Camera to Target
cam_target_lock.description: Lock or unlock the camera to the target

cam_cycle_distance.name: Cycle Camera Distance
cam_cycle_distance.description: Cycle the camera distance between several preset values

cam_turn_to_face.name: Turn to Face Camera
cam_turn_to_face.description: Turn ship to face camera direction

look_up.name: Look Up
look_up.description: Change point of view to look straight up

look_down.name: Look Down
look_down.description: Change point of view to look straight down

bind_save_file.name: Save Binds to File
bind_save_file.description: Save all your binds to a text file

bind_load_file.name: Load Binds from File
bind_load_file.description: Load a bind file into the client

combat_log.name: Toggle Combat Log
combat_log.description: Turn on combat log. 1=on, 0=off, no param=print status. Prepending the command with ++ turns it into a toggle

ui_load.name: Load UI Settings
ui_load.description: Loads default UI Windows save file, usually Live\ui_settings.txt

ui_save.name: Save UI Settings
ui_save.description: Saves UI layout to default UI Window save file, usually Live\ui_settings.txt

ui_load_file.name: Load UI Settings File
ui_load_file.description: Loads named UI Windows save file

ui_save_file.name: Save UI Settings File
ui_save_file.description: Saves UI layout to named UI Window save file

ui_cancel.name: UI Cancel
ui_cancel.description: Respond "Cancel" to an open dialog box; may not work in all dialogs.

ui_ok.name: UI OK
ui_ok.description: Respond "OK" to an open dialog box; may not work in all dialogs.

chat_log.name: Toggle Chat Log
chat_log.description: Turn on chat log. 1=on, 0=off, no param=print status. Prepending the command with ++ turns it into a toggle

remember_ui_lists.name: Remember UI Lists
remember_ui_lists.description: Whether to remember UI List Column placement and width.

ui_remember_positions.name: Remember UI Positions
ui_remember_positions.description: Whether to remember UI sizes and positions. On by default.

safe_login.name: Safe Login
safe_login.description: If true, then log the player back into their most recent static map instead of anything else.

goto_character_select.name: Go to Character Select
goto_character_select.description: Go to the character select screen without logging out.

ui_gen_layers_reset.name: Reset UI Layout
ui_gen_layers_reset.description: Resets the layout, used for when the server updates movable window positions

ui_resolution.name: Print UI Resolution
ui_resolution.description: Print the current UI screen resolution.

ui_tooltip_delay.name: Set Tooltip Delay
ui_tooltip_delay.description: Sets the additional delay, in seconds, before tooltips appear

show_game_ui_no_extra_keybinds.name: Show Game UI (No Extra Keybinds)
show_game_ui_no_extra_keybinds.description: This command does not add any keybinds for showing the UI when the user presses escape

change_instance.name: Change Instance
change_instance.description: Change to an already created instance of the same map. Only works while not at red alert.

aim.name: Aim/Scope
aim.description: Toggle scope on/off. In scope mode the player does more damage. Can either be used as a toggle or a press and hold

holster.name: Holster Weapon
holster.description: Attempt to holster your active weapon

holster_toggle.name: Holster Toggle
holster_toggle.description: Attempt to holster or draw your weapons

unholster.name: Unholster Weapon
unholster.description: Attempt to draw your active weapon

shooter_clear_offset_tray_binds.name: Shooter Clear Offset Tray Binds
shooter_clear_offset_tray_binds.description: Clear the starting location and movement of the yellow action box that appears on the tray while in shooter mode

shooter_clear_overlay_tray_binds.name: Shooter Clear Overlay Tray Binds
shooter_clear_overlay_tray_binds.description: Clear overlay tray bindings for shooter mode

shooter_set_offset_tray_binds.name: Shooter Set Offset Tray Binds
shooter_set_offset_tray_binds.description: Set the starting location and movement of the yellow action box that appears on the tray while in shooter mode

shooter_set_overlay_tray_binds.name: Shooter Set Overlay Tray Binds
shooter_set_overlay_tray_binds.description: Set overlay tray bindings for shooter mode

setrallypoint.name: Set Rally Point
setrallypoint.description: Set a rally point for your current target

setrallypointconsole.name: Set Rally Point (Console)
setrallypointconsole.description: Set a rally point for your current target (console variant)

clearrallypoint.name: Clear Rally Point
clearrallypoint.description: Clear the rally point for your current target

assist.name: Assist
assist.description: Assist '<name>': Assists the Entity with the matching name. If no name is given, assists your current target.

net_timing_graph.name: Net Timing Graph
net_timing_graph.description: Enable or disable the network timing graph (0=disable, 1=enable)

net_timing_graph_alpha.name: Net Timing Graph Alpha
net_timing_graph_alpha.description: Set transparency level for network timing graph (50=highest transparency, 255=no transparency)

net_timing_graph_paused.name: Net Timing Graph Paused
net_timing_graph_paused.description: Pause or resume the network timing graph (0=pause disabled, 1=pause enabled)

netgraph.name: Net Graph
netgraph.description: Display SND and RCV network data as text (1=enabled, 0=disabled)

create_alias_to_get_started: Create an alias to get started
create_aliases_hint: Create command aliases to simplify complex command sequences.
alias_exists: An alias with this name already exists
failed_to_get_profile_for_import: Failed to get profile for import
import_completed_keybinds_with_aliases: Import completed: {{keyCount}} keybinds ({{aliasCount}} aliases ignored - use Import Aliases)
permission_denied_to_folder: Permission denied to write to folder
auto_save_description: Automatically save changes as you work
validation_mode_description: How strictly to validate commands and keybinds
sync_folder_description: Choose a folder to automatically sync your projects
auto_sync_description: Automatically sync changes to the selected folder
auto_sync_interval_description: How often to automatically sync your changes
theme_description: Choose between light and dark themes
compact_mode_description: Use a more compact interface layout
language_description: Choose the language for the interface
debug_mode_description: Enable debug logging and developer tools
backup_interval_description: How often to automatically backup your work
vfx_manager_description: Select visual effects to disable using dynFxSetFXExlusionList aliases. Effects are organized by environment.
app_description: A comprehensive web-based tool for creating, editing, and managing Star Trek Online keybind configurations with visual editing and advanced features.
select_a_space_ground_build_or_aliases_t: Select a Space/Ground build or Aliases to preview export.
select_alias_from_left_panel: Select an alias from the left panel to view and edit its command chain.
select_key_from_left_panel: Select a key from the left panel to view and edit its command chain.
failed_to_select_all_space_effects: Failed to select all space effects
failed_to_select_all_ground_effects: Failed to select all ground effects
profile_name_too_long: Profile name is too long (max 50 characters)
profile_name_already_exists: A profile with this name already exists
failed_to_create_profile_from_template: Failed to create profile from template
sto_tools_keybind_manager_loaded_success: STO Tools Keybind Manager loaded successfully
no_effects_selected: No effects selected. Please select at least one effect to generate aliases.
generated_vertigo_aliases: Generated {{count}} Vertigo alias{{plural}}! Check the Alias Manager to bind them to keys.
application_reset_successfully: Application reset successfully. All data cleared.
confirm_delete_alias: Are you sure you want to delete the alias "{{aliasName}}"?
confirm_delete_key: Are you sure you want to delete the key "{{keyName}}" and all its commands?
confirm_clear_commands: Are you sure you want to clear all commands for "{{keyName}}"?
confirm_delete_profile:
Are you sure you want to delete the profile "{{profileName}}"?

This action cannot be undone.
confirm_reset_application:
Are you sure you want to reset the application?

This will delete all profiles, keybinds, and settings. This action cannot be undone.
click_add_command_to_start_building_your: Click 'Add Command' to start building your command chain for
Click 'Add Command' to start building your alias chain for
create_aliases_in_the_alias_manager_firs: Create aliases in the Alias Manager first
enter_the_exact_sto_command_syntax: Enter the exact STO command syntax
replaced_with_your_current_targets_name: Replaced with your current target's name
this_alias_will_automatically_toggle_bet: This alias will automatically toggle between its on/off states when executed
configure_command_options_to_see_preview: Configure command options to see preview
confirm_reset_app: Are you sure you want to reset the application? This will delete all profiles and data. This action cannot be undone.
reserved_command_name: Name conflicts with a STO command
command_chain_near_limit: Command chain is getting long ({{length}} characters). Exceeding 999 may break.
command_chain_too_long: Command chain is too long ({{length}} characters) and may fail in game.
stabilized_non_tray_warning: Stabilized execution should only be used with tray execution abilities.
too_many_commands_on_key: Binding {{count}} commands to one key may fail in game (max recommended 20).
alias_mixed_environment_warning: Alias contains both space-only and ground-only commands; consider splitting for reliability.
